ActiveConfigRules.title: ActiveConfigRules
ActiveConfigRules.summary: Enables multiple rules at a time so that the rules enter the ACTIVE state.

DeleteConfigRules.title: DeleteConfigRules
DeleteConfigRules.summary: Deletes multiple rules at a time.

DescribeCompliance.title: DescribeCompliance
DescribeCompliance.summary: Queries the statistics of compliance evaluation results.

DescribeComplianceSummary.title: DescribeComplianceSummary
DescribeComplianceSummary.summary: Queries the summary of compliance evaluations of the current Alibaba Cloud account.

DescribeConfigRule.title: DescribeConfigRule
DescribeConfigRule.summary: Queries the details of a rule.

DescribeConfigurationRecorder.title: DescribeConfigurationRecorder
DescribeConfigurationRecorder.summary: Queries the types of resources that are monitored by Cloud Config.

DescribeDeliveryChannels.title: DescribeDeliveryChannels
DescribeDeliveryChannels.summary: Queries the information about delivery channels.

DescribeDiscoveredResource.title: DescribeDiscoveredResource
DescribeDiscoveredResource.summary: Queries the configuration of a resource.

DescribeEvaluationResults.title: DescribeEvaluationResults
DescribeEvaluationResults.summary: Queries the evaluation results of a rule.

GetAggregateDiscoveredResource.title: GetAggregateDiscoveredResource
GetAggregateDiscoveredResource.summary: Queries the details of a resource in an account group.

GetDiscoveredResourceCounts.title: GetDiscoveredResourceCounts
GetDiscoveredResourceCounts.summary: Queries the number of resources of the current account.

GetDiscoveredResourceSummary.title: GetDiscoveredResourceSummary
GetDiscoveredResourceSummary.summary: Queries the statistics of the resources monitored by Cloud Config.

GetResourceComplianceTimeline.title: GetResourceComplianceTimeline
GetResourceComplianceTimeline.summary: Queries the compliance timeline of a resource.

GetResourceConfigurationTimeline.title: GetResourceConfigurationTimeline
GetResourceConfigurationTimeline.summary: Queries the configuration timeline of a resource.

GetSupportedResourceTypes.title: GetSupportedResourceTypes
GetSupportedResourceTypes.summary: Queries the resource types that are supported by Cloud Config.

ListAggregateDiscoveredResources.title: ListAggregateDiscoveredResources
ListAggregateDiscoveredResources.summary: Queries a list of resources in an account group.

ListConfigRules.title: ListConfigRules
ListConfigRules.summary: Queries the list of rules that belong to the current Alibaba Cloud account.

ListDiscoveredResources.title: ListDiscoveredResources
ListDiscoveredResources.summary: Queries the resources of the current Alibaba Cloud account.

ListRemediationTemplates.title: ListRemediationTemplates
ListRemediationTemplates.summary: Queries the remediation templates for a managed rule.

PutConfigRule.title: PutConfigRule
PutConfigRule.summary: Creates or modifies a rule for the current account.

PutConfigurationRecorder.title: PutConfigurationRecorder
PutConfigurationRecorder.summary: Adds or modifies the types of resources that are monitored by Cloud Config.

PutDeliveryChannel.title: PutDeliveryChannel
PutDeliveryChannel.summary: Creates or modifies a delivery channel for the current account.

StartConfigRuleEvaluation.title: StartConfigRuleEvaluation
StartConfigRuleEvaluation.summary: Re-evaluates the compliance of resources based on a rule or compliance package.

StartConfigurationRecorder.title: StartConfigurationRecorder
StartConfigurationRecorder.summary: Specifies the resource monitoring scope of the current account.

StopConfigRules.title: StopConfigRules
StopConfigRules.summary: Disables multiple rules at a time so that the rules enter the INACTIVE state.
